nodes.text: Ehartt Brihnt was a wealthy male Rodian hunter.

Moving to the Wookiee planet Kashyyyk, Brihnt joined with three other hunters to establish big-game hunting and safari expeditions in the Etyyy or Rodian Hunting Grounds there. Brihnt allied himself with Sordaan Xris, the wealthiest Rodian on Kashyyyk, which made him unpopular with many other safari hunters.

Ehartt Brihnt was a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
